== About ==
 {*} This is a group of Operators/Moderators for all channels of UbuntuEG. The mission of it's members is to keep all UbnntuEG's channels Welcoming, Open, SPAM-free and ad-free. We maintain the peacfull environment by following some general <nowiki>[[EgyptTeam-KnowledgeBase-Operators-Principles|principles]]</nowiki>.

==== Current Manager ====
 {*} Current manager of Ubuntu Egypt Operators Team is: '''<nowiki>[[|]]</nowiki>'''.

== Joining ==
==== Joining  Requirements: ====
1. Know Team's System and regulations.
2. Previous experience with linux communities/user groups.
3. Good understanding of the channel you want to help with moderating/operating.

==== Joining Steps ====
1. Register yourself on launchpad.net, '''<nowiki>[[https://login.launchpad.net/+new_account|here]]</nowiki>'''.
2. Sign the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/project/about-ubuntu/conduct|CoC]]</nowiki>.
3. Study the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/project/about-ubuntu/leadership-conduct|LCoC]]</nowiki>.
4. Then get proposed to the Ubuntu Egypt Ops team, '''<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-eg-ops/+join|here]]</nowiki>'''.
5. Send an e-mail to , declaring your will to follow the LCoC and your interest to join along with which channel you want to serve as an operator on.(''Thanks for help ;) )
